headline: T-Mobile CEO plans major changes after more phone customers flee
summary: T-Mobile is facing mounting pressures as competition from other wireless carriers intensifies. In recent months, the company has seen a growing number of phone customers leave, prompting its CEO to plan major changes to help reverse the trend. In its latest earnings report, T-Mobile revealed ...
